item.title: Kremlin Seeks Control Over Wagner's Global Paramilitary Empire
item.description: In the wake of the coup, the Kremlin faces challenges in its bid to take over Wagner paramilitary group’s extensive global network. Founded by Yevgeny Prigozhin, Wagner’s intricate web of companies, involved in war, security, and mining operations, have blurred ties with the Russian government. The group’s vast structure and Prigozhin’s recent disappearance further complicate the Kremlin’s mission. Learn more in our story here.

item.title: Shadow Men: Inside Wagner, Russiaâ€™s Secret War Company
item.description: Check out our investigative documentary on the mysterious Wagner Group. Over the years, under the leadership of Yevgeny Prigozhin, it has grown from a small, clandestine force into a global war cartel now heavily involved in Russia’s assault in Ukraine. Our documentary focuses on the group’s sprawling business interests, looking at how Wagner promotes the Kremlin’s strategic ambitions across four continents while plundering local resources such as gold and diamonds.
